tit.e: The To-ji school of the Shingon sect
The To-ji school of the Shingon sect
The To-ji school of the Shingon sect

sen.j: 真言宗東寺派は、日本における真言宗系の仏教宗派。
sen.e: The To-ji school of the Shingon sect is a Buddhism school of the Shingon sect in Japan.
The To-ji school of the Shingon sect is a Buddhism school of the Shingon sect in Japan.
The To-ji school of the Shingon sect is a Buddhism school of the Shingon sect in Japan.

sen.j: 1963年（昭和38年）に、東寺と真言宗東寺派が分裂したが、後に東寺を中心に活動しようとする寺院が東寺真言宗として独立した。
sen.e: In 1963 the To-ji Temple and the To-ji school of the Shingon sect were split, and later the temples which supported the To-ji Temple became independent as the To-ji Shingon sect.
In 1963 the To-ji Temple and the To-ji school of the Shingon sect were split, and later the temples which supported the To-ji Temple became independent as the To-ji Shingon sect.
